'United States' }, { code: 'um', name: 'United States Minor Outlying Islands' }, { code: 'uy', name: 'Uruguay' }, { code: 'uz', name: 'Uzbekistan' }, { code: 'vu', name: 'Vanuatu' }, { code: 've', name: 'Venezuela' }, { code: 'vn', name: 'Viet Nam' }, { code: 'vg', name: 'Virgin Islands, British' }, { code: 'vi', name: 'Virgin Islands, U.S.' }, { code: 'wf', name: 'Wallis and Futuna' }, { code: 'eh', name: 'Western Sahara' }, { code: 'ye', name: 'Yemen' }, { code: 'zm', name: 'Zambia' }, { code: 'zw', name: 'Zimbabwe' } ]; function App() { const [file, setFile] = useState(null); const [jobs, setJobs] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [atsScore, setAtsScore] = useState(null); const [suggestions, setSuggestions] = useState(null); const [applications, setApplications] = useState({}); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('software'); const [applicationStatus, setApplicationStatus] = useState({}); const [location, setLocation] = useState(''); const [includeRemote, setIncludeRemote] = useState(true); const [country, setCountry] = useState('us'); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [noJobsInRegion, setNoJobsInRegion] = useState(false); const handleFileChange = (event) => { setFile(event.target.files[0]); }; const handleUpload = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (!file) return; setError(null); setNoJobsInRegion(false); setLoading(true); const formData = new FormData(); formData.append('resume', file); formData.append('jobCategory', selectedCategory); formData.append('location', location); formData.append('includeRemote', includeRemote); formData.append('country', country); try { const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/upload-resume', formData); if (response.data.jobs.length === 0) { setNoJobsInRegion(true); if (includeRemote) { setError('No jobs found in this region or remote positions available.'); } else { setError('No local jobs found. Try enabling remote jobs to see more opportunities.'); } } else { setJobs(response.data.jobs); setAtsScore(response.data.atsScore); setSuggestions(response.data.suggestions); } } catch (error) { console.error('Upload failed:', error); if (error.response?.status === 404) { setError('Job search is not available in this region.'); } else { setError(`Upload failed: ${error.message}`); } } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const handleQuickApply = (job) => { if (job.redirect_url) { window.open(job.redirect_url, '_blank'); } else { alert('Application URL not available'); } }; return (

Job Matchmaker

setLocation(e.target.value)} placeholder="e.g., New York, NY" />
{error && (

{error}

{noJobsInRegion && !includeRemote && ( )}
)}
{atsScore && (

ATS Score: {atsScore}%

Suggestions for Improvement:

{suggestions}

)}
{jobs.length === 0 && !loading && !error && (

No jobs found. Try:

  • Adjusting your location filters
  • Enabling remote jobs
  • Changing the job category
  • Searching in a different region

Popular job markets:

)} {jobs.map(job => (

{job.title}

{job.company}

{job.is_remote ? 'üåê Remote' : `üìç ${job.location}`}

{job.salary_min && job.salary_max && (

${job.salary_min.toLocaleString()} - ${job.salary_max.toLocaleString()}

)}
))}
); } export default App;
